forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain will fall throughout the day. High 54F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening clouds will give way to clearing. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening clouds will give way to clearing. Low 44F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High near 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High around 60F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 59F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.
